alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 1:19PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Itawamba, northeastern Lee, southern Tishomingo and southeastern Prentiss Counties through 145 PM CST... At 119 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandy Springs, or 13 miles east of Baldwyn, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Mantachie, Tishomingo, Sandy Springs, Fairview, Pratts Friendship, Marietta, Golden, Paden, Thrasher, Dennis, Moores Mill, Bloody Springs, Kirkville, Carter Branch, Mingo, Hobo Station, Petertown and Neil. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
